Robust Engineering
Using Science, Statistics, and Critical Thinking to improve product design robustness

Statistical Tests

Student t-Test
Conditions
H0
HA
Normally distributed data
μ1 = μt
μ1 ≠ μt
Bartlett's Test
Conditions
H0
HA
Normally distributed data and more than 2 levels
σ1 = σ2 = σ3 ...
σi ≠ σj for i ≠ j or at least 1 is different
Chi2 Test
Conditions
H0
HA
Normally distributed data with 1 levels looking for StandardDeviation compared to target (t)
σ1 = σt
σ1 ≠ σt
F Test
Conditions
H0
HA
Normally distributed data with 2 levels looking for Standard Deviation
σ1 = σ2
σ1 ≠ σ2
